alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:49AM CDT until August 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR MONTGOMERY COUNTY... At 748 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Independence to near Tyro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Cherryvale, Caney, Dearing, Elk City, Tyro, Liberty, Havana, Bolton, Sycamore, Elk City Lake, Elk City State Park, Independence Airport and Coffeyville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
